The Half-Life series goes in the history books as one of the greatest series in gaming I think. It's a first-person shooter. amazing story, fun puzzles, and some pretty sweet physics. I will never forgive valve for stopping at episode 2. The story seriosly just stops like in the middle. No climax. No falling action. If you never play episode 1 or 2, you might feel complete, but if you start those expansion, get ready to get mad.

This game has been more than a game for me. To me, this game is an entire universe. Sometimes I can't tell the difference between Half-Life 2 and Real-Life when I play. The controls are spectacular, it never lags, the mouse control is smooth. This game is for skilled players, and new players alike. It's wonderful. Despite the fact that this game is 10 years old, It's a game good enough to compare to today's standards. Not so many cutscenes, combat at the right times, and characters you can come to love and care for. This game was partly an inspiration for me to make my own games, and I've made nine. The Source Engine is one of my favorite engines, and I think even the old version could be used to make so many good games even today. I definitely reccommend this game. It'll give you an experience that you'll want to see more of. Sort of like BioShock Infinite, you don't want to see it end. Buy Half-Life 2 and each of It's episodes and you'll understand why everybody makes such a big deal over gettng to see Half-Life 3. This game has affcected and given us so many other loved games such as Portal, Portal 2, Left for Dead and Left for Dead 2, and many more. I love this game, and you will too.

Оффигенная игра

What can I say? It's Half-Life 2, pretty much the perfect game. It has an interesting story that remains tightly focused on a core group of characters while never revealing too much to the player. It has ever-evolving gameplay mechanics that all use the same basic controls so it never gets too complicated. Everything from the environment design to the characters to the enemies looks absoutely beautiful even though the game was released a decade ago.

The only downside is the fact that Half-Life 2 was so revoultionary, so innovative, that if you still haven't played it yet, it might actually seem quaint and boring to you. 

Yes, Half-Life 2 unfortunately suffers from the "Seinfeld is Lame" problem in that since its release, almost every first-person shooter released afterwards has copied the game's mechanics in one way or another. So even though you've never played Half-Life 2, you've almost certainly played some sort of derivative.

But don't let that discourage you. Half-Life 2 is still one of the greatest first-person shooter games ever made. I suggest you buy it on sale for the 2014 Steam Holiday Sale and play it all the way through in one day, preferably with some good headphones plugged in at 1080p with full settings on. You won't regret it, unless you're fucking stupid.

Эх старый и добрый 2005
Первую главу несколько часов проходил из-за того, что охриневал от графики, и физика на высоте!
Бродил не поддаваясь сюжету: ломая коробки, переставляя вещи,также играть с трупом, дырявить стены с монтировкой и пистолетом, пытаться выйти в открытый мир и многое другое. Русский язык, русская озвучка - это было редкостью в те времена
После cs 1.6 и hl охриневал от half life 2, я долго играл эту игру,  уже часов 500-600 бы уже набралось. Перепроходя снова и снова, только в 4 перепрохождении я начал понимать сюжет. Да в те времена игр не так было много на компьютере - nfs hot pursit 2, cs 1.6, hl  . Вот сейчас я наверно 9 или 13 раз(наверно больше) перепрохожу, после этого выучиваешь каждую точку загрузки карты, каждую текстуру, оружие, лица всех людей и все и всех, такой бегаешь и -ага сейчас будет загрузка [Загрузка], -ага сейчас спустятся 2ое метрокопов с мп7, блин! Аааа, мэнхэки! Советую всем поиграть в эту игру

Favorite FPS Hands Down

A classic staple for anyone wanting a good FPS game to get started with on Steam.

My favorite part was when the combine decided it was a great idea to still charge at me in the dozens despite watching me having just gone through most of their forces like a kitten catching and eating a mouse. Needless to say, many laughs were had all around as they Combine seemed to have no issue with the losses and kept on going.

Meanwhile, most people standing aside Gordon were dumb enough to usually stand in his way and became meat shields, only for more to join and continue to do what they do best, stand in the way and try to reassure Gordon he has "no reason to worry." Five seconds later they are down for the count, Gordon, Alyx, and Eli move on.

The game has many fun things all around, shotguns, gravity guns, rockets, grenades, crowbars, shotguns, antlion minions, magnums, crossbows, shotguns, allies dying beside you by being complete idiots. Oh, did I mention shotguns yet?

9.5/10 - Great Comedy FPS, would play again for the comedic value that Gordon's allies provide.
I want to marry this game~

Besides Portal, this is the best VALVe game I have ever played.

What makes this game great for me is the variety of gameplay for each chapter. No two chapters feek alike. One chapter feels like a survival horror game. Another chapter feels like a tower defense game. Some chapters have you driving vehicles around at high speeds taking out enemies as you drive by. There's a chapter that has you commanding a squad of allies similar to a game like Pikmin. But even with the huge amount of variety in each chapter, one thing stays consistent: the quality of the game. It's amazing from start to finish and it's definitely a must play.

IL CAPOSTIPITE DEL GAMEING MODERNO: dentro questo capolavoro del 2004 ( sttolinieo: 2004!) c'è tutto. 
Si va da momenti in puro stile FPS a Horror Survival fino a situazioni di platforming.
Half Life 2 è IL gioco che ha messo la FISICA in primo piano, stravolgendo il canone dei GamePlay dei titoli di dieci anni fa. 
Trama avvincente, si spreca purtroppo nel finale tirato via. Poteva segnare il passo per un evoluzione di gameing ancor più perfetta, invece dopo questo titolo poche innovazioni. 
Tante le citazioni a 1984 ( City 17 e il suo governo distopico), a La Guerra dei Mondi ( il design degli Strider), a Star Wars ( gli interni della Cittadella richiamano molto gli interni della Morte Nera nonchè la ribellione in atto a City 17) e gli Zombi ispirati ai mostri di H.P. Lovevercraft ( e sicuramenti altri riferimenti che mi sfuggono).


VOTO:

9/10

Quick review time!

Half Life 2 It's a classic first person shooter. I found it very unique and memorable. It is limited by the time it was created, which is apparent by the loading screens and low resolution graphics, but it still does deliver a compelling story and fun gameplay. It's particularly unique with its gravity and puzzle physics, not to mention the iconic characters. I remember playing this game and getting excited to collect every single achivement.

I recommend getting this one, especially if you own garry's mod already.

Half life 3 confirmed

One of the (if not THE) first games that I ever played on Steam, Half-Life 2 was, at the time, a totally unique and beautifully immersive experience. The physics were unlike anything that we'd seen before; the story was compelling; the scenery was beautiful, as were the characters; The weapons were well considered and well balanced - there was much to love about this game. I lost a week of evenings to this game - coming home from work to become engrossed in this masterpiece for hours on end.

An excellent and truly memorable game - still well worth playing now some 10 years after first release.

I am not really a first person shooter fan. Its always the same thing over and over again with little bits changed up. Even though i think this game is over 10 years old, it still holds up as the only FPS I will play. It inspires true moments of horror, bravery, sadness, and joy throughout its campaign, and all of the levels are intracately designed with lots to explore and multiple ways to go about shooting headcrabs and SS style goons. 

Pick up that can.

ce jeu contien la meilleur campagne solo existante. half life 2 contien des méchaniques de jeux peu communes au autres jeux et en plus, elles ne sont pas sous exploitées. ce jeu est tèllement immersif et les personnages ont une vraie personalité assez sympatique. depuis que j'ai acheté ce jeu, j'ai envi d'acheter tout les jeu de la série. ce jeu cache des mystères, comme le fammeu Gman. je ne sais pas combien de fois j'ai recommencé le jeu pour avoir tout les succès ! ce jeu a une diversité allucinante ! on passe de la dictature, aux évasions d'extraterrestres, aux zombies, aux termites, à la prison, à l'infiltration, etc... même si ce jeu date de 2006, il n'en reste tout de moin MAGNIFIQUE (je n'imagine même pas pour l'époque).

Gordon Freeman is back and he has been awoken by G-Man. I advise you complete Half-Life before you play Half-Life 2 becuase if you go in without any knowledge nothing will make sense. So anyway back to the point. In 2004 when this game came out it really did revolutionise First-Person shooters. With the new source engine to run on Half-Life 2 has amazing new features and graphics that still compare well to modern games. One of the best games of all time is an understatement this game changed gaming history and for that it deserves more than a simple good review. There are so many mods to keep you entertained after you've beat the game as well. Half-Life 2 is immortal and will go up in history as one of the best video games of all time whether you like it or not. I'll give out of 10 Half-Life 2 a 9.5/10. I am now too a man of few words.
muy interesdcxnhcwqnwjqimnwve
Love this game.  Played it on launch day, and still play it a few times a month.

Altough it is more than 10 years old, its grapics aren't top-notch and sometimes irritating AI, this is my favorite singleplayer game of all: 
[list]
[*]The story; it is completely linear, but it gave me a sense of freedom, taking out objectives and navigating through levels.
[*]The characters; they are not in your face, they are all very unique (except the citizens ofcourse) and have a dark sense of humor.
[*]The enemies; they are as strong (or weak) as you like, making it possible to plow through them or needing to be very tactical.
[*]The levels; although for today the graphics aren't so beautiful, at time of release this was amazing, but even so I loved just looking around the levels to admire the great level design (especially the citadel, I can understand why Breene wants to live there).
[/list]

[h1]So if you still haven't played this wonderful piece of art, go buy it! NOW![/h1]
